articles.description: All the latest football news and build-up to the weekend's Premier League and FA Cup action.

articles.description: Follow live action & updates from the 2025 World Snooker Championship taking centre stage at the iconic Crucible Theatre in Sheffield.

articles.description: Chris Eubank Jr discusses his must-win fight against rival Conor Benn, his fractured relationship with his father and why he never liked being the villain.
articles.title: Eubank vs Benn: Boxing's favourite villain turns anti-hero

articles.description: Liverpool manager Arne Slot says his team have a "big responsibility" to secure the club's 20th top-flight title against Tottenham at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool have 'big responsibility' to win title at Anfield - Arne Slot

articles.description: The jersey worn by basketball legend Kobe Bryant on his Los Angeles Lakers debut sells for £5.26m at auction.
articles.title: Kobe Bryant's Los Angeles Lakers debut jersey sells for £5.26m at auction

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on golf superstar and Nottingham Forest fan Lee Westwood with his predictions for this weekend's FA Cup semi-finals and Premier League games.

articles.description: Rory McIlroy and partner Shane Lowry post a 64 which puts them six behind the leaders as they begin the defence of their Zurich Classic title.
articles.title: Zurich Classic: Defending champions Rory McIlroy and Shane Lowry six off early pace

articles.description: New England head coach Charlotte Edwards says there is a “very short” list of candidates to replace Heather Knight as captain.
articles.title: Charlotte Edwards says list for new England captain is 'very short'
